item.title: Vision Transformer Neural Architecture Search for Out-of-Distribution Generalization: Benchmark and Insights
item.description: OoD-ViT-NAS: a new benchmark reveals how ViT architecture impacts out-of-distribution generalization, highlighting the importance of embedding dimension and challenging the reliance on in-distribution…
